nodes.text: The Retail Caucus, a minor corporate body based on the planet Kerkoidia, maintained a private army of LR-57 combat/retail droids, distinctive battle droids manufactured by the organization. Attracted to the command structure of the Confederacy of Independent Systems by Count Dooku's promises of unlimited pursuit of profits, the corporation's army was incorporated into the Confederacy military, their droids deployed as heavy weapons units. Retail Caucus droids were a part of the Separatist army commanded by General Whorm Loathsom during the Battle of Christophsis, as well as the droid army fielded during the Battle of Malastare.
